“
I provide strategic communications advice and practical media training to help clients promote campaigns, events, and ideas. Below are a few recent projects:
Media training workshops for the British Embassy in Hanoi

I designed and delivered media training workshops for British Embassy staff in Hanoi. I taught skills including message development, pitching to journalists, and handling difficult questions and facilitated practical, on-camera interview practice.

Media consulting for the LIN Center for Community Development

I was a media consultant to LIN’s annual “cross-sector” conference, a major event bringing together global business, government, and non-profit leaders to discuss sustainable development. I helped LIN to secure positive national and international press coverage on television, in print, and online.

Communications training for a UK-Vietnam government anti-human trafficking campaign

I provided communications training for a joint initiative between the UK and Vietnamese governments. I taught participants how to use the media to raise awareness of human trafficking in remote and at-risk communities.

Public relations training for MBA students at British University Vietnam

I taught an introduction to public relations to MBA students at British University Vietnam. The course covered basic principles such as developing effective messages, defining target audiences, and delivering successful communications campaigns.
